text: Gayon Evans (born 15 January 1990) is a Jamaican sprinter. She won a silver medal in the 4 × 100 metres relay at the 2017 IAAF World Relays. ==International competitions== {| |- !colspan="6"|Representing |- |rowspan=2|2007 |rowspan=2|World Youth Championships |rowspan=2|Ostrava, Czech Republic |25th (h) |100 m |12.171 |- |bgcolor=silver|2nd |Medley relay |2:06.77 |- |2008 |World Junior Championships |Bydgoszcz, Poland |bgcolor=silver|2nd |4 × 100 m relay |43.98 |- |rowspan=2|2009 |rowspan=2|Pan American Junior Championships |rowspan=2|Port of Spain, Trinidad and Tobago |6th |100 m |11.71 |- |bgcolor=silver|2nd |4 × 100 m relay |44.96 |- |rowspan=2|2014 |Pan American Sports Festival |Mexico City, Mexico |bgcolor=cc9966|3rd |100 m |11.72 |- |Central American and Caribbean Games |Xalapa, Mexico |10th (h) |200 m |24.33 |- |2017 |World Relays |Nassau, Bahamas |bgcolor=silver|2nd |4 × 100 m relay |42.95 |- |rowspan=3|2018 |World Indoor Championships |Birmingham, United Kingdom |25th (h) |60 m |7.332 |- |rowspan=2|Commonwealth Games |rowspan=2|Gold Coast, Australia |bgcolor=cc9966|3rd |100 m |11.22 |- |bgcolor=silver|2nd |4 × 100 m relay |42.52 |- |2019 |World Relays |Yokohama, Japan |bgcolor=silver|2nd |4 × 100 m relay |43.29 |} 1Disqualified in the quarterfinals 2Did not start in the semifinals ==Personal bests== Outdoor *100 metres – 11.22 (+1.0 m/s, Gold Coast 2018) *200 metres – 23.18 (+1.3 m/s, Kingston 2017) *400 metres – 55.46 (Annapolis 2014) Indoor *60 metres – 7.14 (Karlsruhe 2017) *200 metres – 23.36 (Boston 2014) *400 metres – 56.22 (New York 2013) ==References== Category:1990 births Category:Living people Category:Jamaican female sprinters Category:Commonwealth Games medallists in athletics Category:Commonwealth Games silver medallists for Jamaica Category:Commonwealth Games bronze medallists for Jamaica Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 2018 Commonwealth Games Category:People from Manchester Parish
title: Gayon Evans
